001
002package com.commercetools.api.predicates.query;
003
004import java.util.function.Function;
005import java.util.function.Supplier;
006
007import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.Builder;
008
009public class CombinationQueryPredicate<T> implements QueryPredicate, Builder<QueryPredicate> {
010    private final QueryPredicate predicate;
011
012    private final Supplier<T> modelSupplier;
013
014    public CombinationQueryPredicate(final QueryPredicate predicate, final Supplier<T> modelSupplier) {
015        this.predicate = predicate;
016        this.modelSupplier = modelSupplier;
017    }
018
019    public CombinationQueryPredicate<T> and(final Function<T, CombinationQueryPredicate<T>> fn) {
020        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(
021            BinaryQueryPredicate.of().left(predicate).right(fn.apply(modelSupplier.get())).operator("and"),
022            modelSupplier);
023    }
024
025    public CombinationQueryPredicate<T> or(final Function<T, CombinationQueryPredicate<T>> fn) {
026        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(
027            BinaryQueryPredicate.of().left(predicate).right(fn.apply(modelSupplier.get())).operator("or"),
028            modelSupplier);
029    }
030
031    public CombinationQueryPredicate<T> not() {
032        return new CombinationQueryPredicate<>(
033            ContainerQueryPredicate.of().parent(ConstantQueryPredicate.of().constant("not")).inner(predicate),
034            modelSupplier);
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    public String render() {
039        return predicate.render();
040    }
041
042    @Override
043    public QueryPredicate build() {
044        return predicate;
045    }
046}
